"canada_births_1991_2022" \
Births in Canada from 1991 to 2022, monthly and annually \
Jon Harmon and Tracy Teal \
January 9, 2024 \
html
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
df <- read.csv("canada_births_1991_2022.csv")
yearly <- df |>
  group_by(year) |>
  summarize(total_births = sum(births))

ggplot(yearly, aes(x = year, y = total_births)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue", size = 1) +
  geom_point(color = "red") +
  labs(title = "Births in Canada from 1991 to 2022",
       x = "Year",
       y = "# of Births")
```
